55 KM NE of Morondava via route 8 at the forestry concession of the Centre de Formation Professional Forestière (CFPF), Kirindy Forest. 4.5 KM E of route 8 on the principal concession road (Piste CONOCO) along S boundary of forestry block CN4. Selectively disturbed dry forest with Boudouinia fluggeiformis, Terminalia sp., Grewia sp., dominant. Collected with D.K. Harder, E.A. Rakotobe, T.G. Razafindrabeaza & J.P. Abraham.
